head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GOLDSTEIN, DR. GABRIEL F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GOLDSTEIN, DR. GABRIEL F.

block.p: GOLDSTEIN-Dr. Gabriel F. The Yeshiva University family mourns the passing of a loyal friend and respected member of the Jewish community who was president of the Harry and Jane Fischel Foundation, a YU Guardian; beloved husband of Bobbye S.; father of Frederic S. (and Phyllis Lefton) Goldstein; and brother of Simeon H.F. (and Naomi) Goldstein, Dr. Naomi (and Rabbi Shear Yashuv) Cohen, and the late Rebbitzin Josephine (and Rabbi O. Asher) Reichel. Our Harry Fischel School for Higher Jewish Studies was established through a grant from the Fischel Foundation in 1945. We extend our heartfelt condolences to grandchildren and the entire family. May they be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Dr. Norman Lamm, President Yeshiva University David S. Gottesman, Chairman Board of Trustees

Our Harry Fischel School for Higher Jewish Studies was established through a grant from the Fischel Foundation in 1945. We extend our heartfelt condolences to grandchildren and the entire family. May they be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Dr. Norman Lamm, President Yeshiva University David S. Gottesman, Chairman Board of Trustees
